sourcesContent:
import GetWidthOfComponent from './GetWidthOfComponent' import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import _Header from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_Header' import _Navbar from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/_Navbar' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' import narcos from '../Static/Images/narcos.png'; import MovieInfo from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/MovieInfo' import ImageOfRolePlayers from '../SecondaryComponents/Desktop/ImageOfRolePlayers'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; import imax from '../Static/Images/imax.png'; import premiere from '../Static/Images/premiere.png'; import lumiere from '../Static/Images/lumiere.png'; import dreamers from '../Static/Images/dreamers.png'; import shaw from '../Static/Images/shaw.png'; import got from '../Static/Images/got.png'; const DesktopComponent = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [hovered, setHovered] = useState(false); const [bgColor, setBgColor] = useState('#111111'); const [width, setWidth] = useState(window.innerWidth); useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => setWidth(window.innerWidth); window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); if (width < 1000) setBgColor('transparent') else setBgColor('#111111') return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }); const OnMouseHovered = () => { setHovered(true); } const OnMouseOut = () => { setHovered(false); } const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> <_Header/> <_Navbar/> Trends Now Poupular Promotions Showtimes Bookings
{children} ) } export default DesktopComponent;
